short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly summarize websites while easily finding sentence context!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never waste time reading unimportant parts of an article again! This extension allows you to easily see the most important sentences in an article with the click of a button.

The most important sentences are highlighted and bolded in the article so they stand out, and they are also shown in a popup box where you can click confusing sentences to be taken directly to that sentence's location for context.
